loan.name: Fredi Ludgardo
loan.use: to purchase organic soil for planting, chemicals, and a trimming machine.
loan.description:
Fredi Ludgardo is a hard-working man who endeavours daily to look after his household. He has an independent business offering garden maintenance and fumigation. He has customers who call him weekly and receives contracts for planting gardens; he also sells organic soil for planting at home and to order. The loans have allowed him to maintain his business and help his household.

He will invest this loan in the purchase of organic soil, chemicals, and a trimming machine.
loan.whySpecial: It helps borrowers withstand negative economic impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic.
